name: New Story
headline: We pioneer solutions to end the global housing crisis by empoweringâ¦
description: Since its inception, NS has raised over $80 million to build thousands of homes across Latin America and impact ~20,000 individuals. In 2021, NS launched a venture capital fund, Hometeam Ventures, focused on early-stage construction and housing innovations. NS graduated from Y Combinator and is a 4x recipient of Fast Companyâs Most Innovative Company.

founders.name: Brett Hagler, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO at New Story.

founders.name: Matthew Marshall, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and Chief Business Officer of New Story.Â 

New StoryÂ pioneers solutions to end global homelessness through a market-driven approach and since starting 8 years ago we've raised over 50M+ and built 37 communities (100-150 homes per project) in Latin America. Our goal is to house 1M individuals by 2030 through sustainable and scalable affordable housing models by blending a mixture of philanthropy, impact investment, and technical expertise.

# Equipping vulnerable families to become land and homeowners
We pioneer solutions to end the global housing crisis by empowering families to become land and homeowners in thriving communities.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fb3/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fff_home-hero-photo__min.webp)
# The housing crisis requires smart solutions families want and can afford.
About 1.8 billion people live without adequate housing. We’re in a global housing crisis — and it’s keeping millions of families, especially women and kids, from reaching their full potential.
We're on a mission to change this story by bringing market-based solutions to those who need them most. Our strategy focuses on making land accessible for families in Latin America so they can buy property, build creditworthiness, and unlock home financing.
**Families are no longer charitable beneficiaries — they’re participants in their journey out of poverty and into housing.**
[How we work](http://newstoryhomes.org/</our-strategy>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fb3/6606c78d134fc6f4225994fb_MotherDaughterAlley.png)Watch video02:36](http://newstoryhomes.org/<#>)
# In the press
[![Apple TV+](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fba/65665e011fab36d9c4af2755_AppleTV_Logo_Dark%402x.png)](http://newstoryhomes.org/<https:/tv.apple.com/us/episode/mexico/umc.cmc.vw8qwc1j4ld8jr3itsc0b3wy>)
[![Wall Street Journal](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fba/6553cf69648c427a4cd543ef_Press_WSJ.png)](http://newstoryhomes.org/<https:/www.wsj.com/articles/3-d-printed-buildings-are-a-tech-twist-on-ancient-construction-techniques-1522580400>)
[![USA Today](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fba/6553cf69648c427a4cd543e5_Press%20Logo__USA%20TODAY.svg)](http://newstoryhomes.org/<https:/www.usatoday.com/videos/tech/2019/12/13/3-d-printed-neighborhood-low-income-families/2638811001/>)
[![CNN](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fba/6553cf69648c427a4cd543ee_PressLogo_CNN-17.png)](http://newstoryhomes.org/<https:/money.cnn.com/2018/03/19/technology/3d-printed-house-new-story/index.html>)
[![New York Times](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fba/6553cf69648c427a4cd543e4_Press%20Logo__The%20New%20York%20Times.svg)](http://newstoryhomes.org/<https:/www.nytimes.com/2021/09/28/business/3D-printing-homes.html>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fb3/6553cf69648c427a4cd54046_Impact%20Hero.webp)
## Growing net worth
When low-income families can secure land, their net worth grows with time. In Etzatlán, Mexico, families who purchased land increased their net worth 2x over four years.
[Our solutions](http://newstoryhomes.org/</our-strategy>)
## Not your traditional charity
We empower vulnerable families to become active participants in a market where they can access and afford quality housing.
### TRADITIONAL HOUSING CHARITY
![New Story](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fb3/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fe8_logo_wordmark.svg)

04

## Bringing market-based solutions to those who need them most.
Our financially sustainable model enables low-income families to access land and housing credit at their income levels. And since we fund the work by blending philanthropy and impact investment, your gift goes further to impact more families.
### Smart Solutions
We invest capital and our team’s expertise into models that support low-income families on their journey to secure land + housing.
### Affordable Financing
We build bridges between market players and families to access financing that is affordable and profitable for providers.
### Innovation
We bring tech and innovation to the market to increase the efficiency while decreasing the costs for land and housing solutions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fb3/6553cf69648c427a4cd54022_Market%20Change%20Images__01.webp)

[Our solutions](http://newstoryhomes.org/</our-strategy>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fb3/65ce30196d6449ad95329fcc_Etzatlan_Land.png)
## Smart solutions
Doing things differently is in our DNA.
As one of the first nonprofits to graduate from Y Combinator, we bring innovative solutions to one of the world’s biggest problems. 
[Our impact](http://newstoryhomes.org/</our-strategy>)
![FAST Company](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fb3/6553cf69648c427a4cd54050_Fast%20Company%20Logo.svg)
Named one of the “world’s most innovative companies” four times by Fast Company.
## A Case Study: Empowering Women in Mexico
In Etzatlán, Mexico, we helped 941 low-income families become first-time landowners. Women make up 60% of these households, which is 32% higher than the national average. When women own property, they increase their physical and financial security.
[See the case study](http://newstoryhomes.org/<https:/drive.google.com/file/d/1hrRT8cmqrU74GuEK7-V_vsrnkzJ_HVQD/view?usp=drive_link>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fb3/6696895de2d5ada493e940a5_MauraEtzatlan.png)
## Stories to write home about
Read our most recent blog posts to learn about the latest impact, innovations, and ideas from New Story.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fba/6797fb789b87b6fed19afada_Framework.png)Why We Built Our Impact Management FrameworkRead story](http://newstoryhomes.org/</blog/why-we-built-our-impact-management-framework>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fba/67531bdfd97c69642ba37379_NoPlaceLikeHome.png)There's No Place Like HomeRead story](http://newstoryhomes.org/</blog/theres-no-place-like-home>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fba/66ec307c6b98d41c3112828c_Ahualulco%20Land%20Development_New%20Story.jpg)Catherine Colyer, COO of WaterEquity, joins New Story’s Board of DirectorsRead story](http://newstoryhomes.org/</blog/catherine-colyer-coo-of-waterequity-joins-new-storys-board-of-directors>)

**Generous donors and investors make our work possible. Here are four ways you can get involved today.**
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6553cf69648c427a4cd53fb3/6553cf69648c427a4cd540f0_photo-bg__aerial__min.webp)Fund a projectDonate to a housing project and impact families.Learn about supporting](http://newstoryhomes.org/</fund-a-project>)

#### Privacy Preference Center
When you visit websites, they may store or retrieve data in your browser. This storage is often necessary for the basic functionality of the website. The storage may be used for marketing, analytics, and personalization of the site, such as storing your preferences. Privacy is important to us, so you have the option of disabling certain types of storage that may not be necessary for the basic functioning of the website. Blocking categories may impact your experience on the website.
[Reject all cookies](http://newstoryhomes.org/<#>)[Allow all cookies](http://newstoryhomes.org/<#>)
#### Manage Consent Preferences by Category
##### Essential
**Always Active**
This is some text inside of a div block.
##### Marketing
Essential
These items are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Advertising networks usually place them with the website operator’s permission.
##### Personalization
Essential
These items allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. For example, a website may provide you with local weather reports or traffic news by storing data about your current location.
##### Analytics
Essential
These items help the website operator understand how its website performs, how visitors interact with the site, and whether there may be technical issues. This storage type usually doesn’t collect information that identifies a visitor.
[Confirm my preferences and close](http://newstoryhomes.org/<#>)

##### Marketing
Essential
These items are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests. Advertising networks usually place them with the website operator’s permission.
##### Personalization
Essential
These items allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. For example, a website may provide you with local weather reports or traffic news by storing data about your current location.
##### Analytics
Essential
These items help the website operator understand how its website performs, how visitors interact with the site, and whether there may be technical issues. This storage type usually doesn’t collect information that identifies a visitor.

generated_description:
### New Story Overview

**Founding and Vision**  
Founded in 2014 and hailing from Atlanta, Georgia, New Story is a nonprofit organization on a bold mission: to end the global housing crisis through innovative solutions. With over $80 million raised and thousands of homes built across Latin America, they've directly impacted approximately 20,000 lives. The mantra here is empowering families—not merely as recipients of charity but as participants in a transformative journey toward homeownership.

**Innovation and Impact**  
New Story has made waves since its inception. They graduated from Y Combinator and have been recognized multiple times as one of Fast Company's Most Innovative Companies. In 2021, they launched Hometeam Ventures, a venture capital fund aimed at boosting early-stage innovations in construction and housing. They're not just about erecting walls; they're about creating scalable, sustainable solutions that respond to the real needs of communities.

**Approach to Housing**  
With 1.8 billion people lacking adequate housing, New Story focuses on making land and financing accessible for families in vulnerable situations. This innovative, market-based approach allows families to build credit, invest in property, and cultivate wealth over time. For instance, families who secured land in Mexico saw their net worth grow twofold in just four years. This isn't your traditional charity model; it's an investment in potential.

**Empowering Women**  
Particularly enlightening is their initiative in Etzatlán, Mexico, where over 941 low-income families became landowners, 60% of whom are led by women—significantly above the national average. This empowerment doesn't just unlock homes but enhances household security, proving that when women own property, they uplift entire communities.

**Getting Involved**  
New Story operates on the foundation of collaboration and community support. Interested individuals can get involved through donations, becoming impact investors, or corporate partnerships. Not only is this about giving—it's about building a sustainable model that thrives on shared value and collaboration.

**Final Thoughts**  
As the global housing crisis continues to loom, New Story stands out with a pragmatic and innovative approach to one of humanity's most pressing issues. They invite everyone to join a journey that transforms not just houses but lives, focusing on empowerment and systemic change. If you're interested in more details, check out their website: [New Story](http://newstoryhomes.org).
